QuestData.Title: Old Enemies
QuestData.Description: So Jaina and the Kirin Tor think they can push us out again? I will not stand by and allow them to repeat the events of Dalaran!$b$bThis time we fight back! This time we do the pushing...$b$bGo to Violet Rise and slay any Kirin Tor agent you find.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 10 Kirin Tor units or players on the Isle of Thunder.
